name: Drakking
printed_effect:
When this Drakking destroys an Elestral in
battle you can Special Cast that Elestral from
the Underworld with {lunar}/{water} Spirits only.
While that Elestral is on your field, this
Drakking cannot be attacked.
effect: When this Drakking destroys an Elestral in battle you can Special Cast that Elestral from the Underworld with {lunar}/{water} Spirits only. While that Elestral is on your field, this Drakking cannot be attacked.
